title: Treating Brain-inspired Memories as Priors for Diffusion Model to Forecast Multivariate Time Series
details: M Wang, W Chen, Z Duan, B Chen - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.18491, 2024
abstract: Forecasting Multivariate Time Series (MTS) involves significant challenges in various application domains. One immediate challenge is modeling temporal patterns with the finite length of the input. These temporal patterns usually involve periodic and …
